trans-unit.source: Represents a shortcut to an application in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en snarvei til en applikasjon i den [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] oppgavelinjen hoppe listen.

trans-unit.source: A JumpTask can be thought of as a shortcut to an application.
trans-unit.target: En JumpTask kan tenke på som en snarvei til en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: You specify the path to the executable file by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi banen til den kjørbare filen ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A> is not set, the path of the current running process is implied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A>er ikke angitt banen til den gjeldende prosessen som kjører antas.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.ApplicationPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can optionally specify <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Arguments%2A> to pass to the application at startup.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt angi <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Arguments%2A>skal sendes til programmet ved oppstart.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Arguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set basic display properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Description%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourcePath%2A> to specify the appearance of the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi grunnleggende visningsegenskapene eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Description%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourcePath%2A>til å angi utseendet til oppgaven i listen hoppe.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourcePath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Description%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: An icon used with a JumpTask must be available as a native resource.
trans-unit.target: Et ikon som brukes med en JumpTask må være tilgjengelig som en innebygd ressurs.

trans-unit.source: If multiple icon resources are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere ikonet ressurser er tilgjengelige i en DLL-filen eller en kjørbar fil, du angi hvilken som skal brukes ved å angi en forskyvning i den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, a JumpTask will be placed in the **Tasks** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en JumpTask plasseres i den **oppgaver** kategorien av hoppe-listen.

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom grouping of tasks by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi egendefinert gruppering av oppgavene ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a JumpTask that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skille elementer i en liste som hopper visuelt ved å opprette en JumpTask som ikke har en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>angitte.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: This empty JumpTask will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Denne tom JumpTask vises som en vannrett linje i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet andre egenskaper kan angis, men de har ikke ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen til applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: If the ApplicationPath property is not specified, then the path of the current running process is implied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ApplicationPath ikke er angitt, antas banen til den gjeldende prosessen som kjører.

trans-unit.source: An application can contain tasks for executables other than itself.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan inneholde oppgaver for kjørbare filer enn seg selv.

trans-unit.source: The path to the application.
trans-unit.target: Banen til applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the arguments passed to the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir argumenter ble sendt til programmet ved oppstart.

trans-unit.source: The arguments passed to the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: Argumentene sendt til programmet ved oppstart.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the tooltip for the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises i verktøytipset for aktiviteten i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the tooltip for the task.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises i verktøytipset for oppgaven.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the zero-based index of an icon embedded in a resource.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den nullbaserte indeksen for et ikon som er innebygd i en ressurs.

trans-unit.source: An icon used with a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> must be available as a native resource.
trans-unit.target: Et ikon som brukes med en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>må være tilgjengelige som en innebygd ressurs.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the IconResourceIndex property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere ikoner er tilgjengelig i en DLL-filen eller en kjørbar fil, kan du angi hvilken som skal brukes ved å angi en forskyvning i egenskapen IconResourceIndex.

trans-unit.source: If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen ressurser ikonet er angitt, eller hvis det angitte ikonet ikke finnes, vises standard system-ikonet.

trans-unit.source: To specify that no icon is displayed, set the IconResourceIndex property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IconResourceIndex til-1 for å angi at ingen ikonet vises.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the icon, or -1 if no icon is used.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for ikonet eller -1 Hvis ingen ikonet brukes.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to a resource that contains the icon to display in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen til en ressurs som inneholder ikonet skal vises i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: An icon used with a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> must be available as a native resource.
trans-unit.target: Et ikon som brukes med en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>må være tilgjengelige som en innebygd ressurs.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: If multiple icons are available in a DLL or executable file, you specify the one to use by indicating an offset in the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis flere ikoner er tilgjengelig i en DLL-filen eller en kjørbar fil, kan du angi hvilken som skal brukes ved å angi en forskyvning i den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no icon resource is specified, or if the specified icon is not found, the standard system icon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen ressurser ikonet er angitt, eller hvis det angitte ikonet ikke finnes, vises standard system-ikonet.

trans-unit.source: To specify that no icon is displayed, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A> property to -1.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi at ingen ikonet vises, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>egenskapen til-1.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.IconResourceIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path to a resource that contains the icon.
trans-unit.target: Banen til en ressurs som inneholder ikonet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for aktiviteten i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Title property must be set for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> to appear in the Jump List as a clickable task.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis Title-egenskapen må være angitt den <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>skal vises i listen hoppe som en klikke oppgave.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> that does not have a Title and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt visuelt skille elementer i en hoppe liste ved å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>som ikke har en tittel og <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>angitte.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: This empty <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Denne tom <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>vises som en vannrett linje i listen hoppe.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: In this case, other properties can be set, but they will not have any effect.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet andre egenskaper kan angis, men de har ikke ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for the task in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises for aktiviteten i listen hoppe.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the working directory of the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir arbeidsmappen til programmet ved oppstart.

trans-unit.source: The working directory of the application on startup.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsmappen for applikasjonen ved oppstart.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
